Package Controller

Class BookingController

Object
BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
BookingController is a controller class that holds the logic to view bookings and make new booking.
Since:
2022-11-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Soh Zu Wei

  • Method Details

    • viewBookingHistory

      public void viewBookingHistory()

    • bookingExistForShowing

      public boolean bookingExistForShowing(String cineplexName, String cinemaName, String movieTitle, Date startDate)
      This function checks whether if a booking already exist for a particular showing. Staff is not supposed to update an existing showing details such as showtime once booking has happened. Returns false if no booking is found. Else, returns true.
      Parameters:
      cineplexName - name of cineplex
      cinemaName - name of cinema
      movieTitle - name of movie
      startDate - start date of showing
      Returns:
      true if booking exists, else false

    • newBooking

      public boolean newBooking(String TID, String cineplexName, String cinemaName, String seatID, String movieTitle, int movieDuration, String movieType, String cinemaType, Date startDate, float price, boolean isWideSeat)
      This function prompts the user to select a movie, a cinema and choose one of the available showing. He will also need to key in his/her name, email address and phone number. Price will be calculated depending on the movie type, time/date of movie, cinema type and whether the type of ticket.
      Parameters:
      TID - booking id
      cineplexName - name of cineplex
      cinemaName - name of cinema
      seatID - seat ID
      movieTitle - name of movie
      movieDuration - duration of movie in mins
      movieType - type of movie (2D, 3D, Blockbuster)
      cinemaType - type of cinema (Standard, IMAX, Platinum Movie Suite)
      startDate - start date and time of showing
      price - ticket price
      isWideSeat - whether movie goer booked a wide seat
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if unsuccessful

    • newBooking

      public boolean newBooking(String TID, String cineplexName, String cinemaName, String seatID, String movieTitle, int movieDuration, String movieType, String cinemaType, Date startDate, float price, boolean isWideSeat, String name, String emailAddress, int phoneNumber)
      This function will book multiple tickets based on inputted name, email address and phone number Price will be calculated depending on the movie type, time/date of movie, cinema type and whether the type of ticket.
      Parameters:
      TID - booking id
      cineplexName - cineplex name
      cinemaName - cinema name
      seatID - seat ID
      movieTitle - name of movie
      movieDuration - duration of movie in mins
      movieType - type of movie (2D, 3D, Blockbuster)
      cinemaType - type of cinema (Standard, IMAX, Platinum Movie Suite)
      startDate - start date and time of showing
      price - ticket price
      isWideSeat - whether user booked a wide seat
      name - name of booker
      emailAddress - email address of booker
      phoneNumber - phone number of booker
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if unsuccessful

    • deleteBookings

      public void deleteBookings(String movieTitle)
      Deletes all bookings of movie
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - name of movie
